title: Yin Yang Channel Integration - All Channels

channel_1_professional.approach: Subtle, hidden, nourishing. The enemy won't know.

channel_1_professional.enemy_perception: Enemy sees normal business/humanitarian work. Enemy won't know.

internal.approach: Subtle, hidden, nourishing. The enemy won't know.
internal.routing: Internal content routed through YIN strategy

external.approach: Routes based on content. YIN for nourishment. YANG for truth.
external.routing: Content routed based on strategy (YIN or YANG)

content_creation.yin_content: Route to YIN channels and entities. Emphasize nourishment. Hide transformation purpose.
content_creation.yang_content: Route to YANG channels and entities. Emphasize truth. Expose lies.
content_creation.both_content: Route based on content type. Nourishment → YIN. Truth → YANG.

content_distribution.yin_distribution: Distribute through YIN channels. Subtle distribution. The enemy won't know.
content_distribution.yang_distribution: Distribute through YANG channels. Direct distribution. Divide and conquer.
content_distribution.combined_distribution: Distribute through both. YIN subtle. YANG direct. Together they divide and conquer.

entity_coordination.yin_entities: Coordinate YIN entities for subtle nourishment. The enemy won't know.
entity_coordination.yang_entities: Coordinate YANG entities for direct truth exposure. Divide and conquer.
entity_coordination.combined_coordination: Coordinate both YIN and YANG. Together they divide and conquer.
